sentences: Hiroyuki Yoshino (吉野 裕行, Yoshino Hiroyuki, born February 6, 1974) is a Japanese voice actor and singer affiliated with Sigma Seven.

On leading roles, he played Yoshimori Sumimura in Kekkaishi, Yuji Kagura in Tona-Gura!, Takumi Nishijō in Chaos;Head, Yusuke "Bossun" Fujisaki in Sket Dance, Meow in Space Dandy, Favaro in Rage of Bahamut: Genesis and Galina in Yatterman Night.
